title: Am I getting low balled? | Ola | Bangalore
content:
*Education*: B.Tech from a tier one college (not IIT)
*Years of Joining*: 2022
*Prior Experience*: Directly placed from campus
*Company*: Ola
*Title*: SDE 1
*Location*: Bangalore
*Salary*: 14,54,545 (Fixed) + 1,45,455 (Variable)
*Signing Bonus*: 2,00,000
*Stock bonus*: None
*Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock)*: 16,00,000

Recently I had a discussion with my manager that my CTC will be hiked 17% from next month because of the appraisal cycle in progress.

I am just curious about how the market is currently and how much am I getting lowballed?

![image](https://assets.leetcode.com/users/images/9931dc69-e6c2-4625-ba59-055f646df055_1723212377.5316103.png)

title: Goldman Sachs | Analyst | 1+ YOE |  Bengaluru (India)
content:
Education: B.Tech in Computer Science, 2023 Pass Out
Years of Experience: 1+ year experience in Product based
Date of the Offer: August 2024
Previous Compensation :
Salary : 10.5 LPA (10+0.5)

Company: Goldman Sachs
Title/Level: SDE-1 (Analyst)
Location: Bangalore
WFO : 5 days
Salary: INR 19,00,000 (Base)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: None
Performance Bonus/Variable Pay: INR 3,00,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): INR 22,0,000
Benefits: 20 Annual Leaves + Infinite sick leave + 15 National holidays + Cab Facility + Other Standard\xA0Benefits

I have worked very hard to cracked all the rounds. I feel I have given the best and just feel if something can be compensated in terms of any Bonus it would have been great. Nevertheless I am happy that I will be joining Goldman Sachs soon.
